title: Direction net force at corner of square of charges

content.prompt: Four point charges of equal magnitude but different signs are arranged on the corners of a square as shown above. Which of the vectors shown represents the direction of the net force acting on the charge at the upper left-hand corner of the square due to the other charges?

choices.label: It has no direction because the force is zero.
